Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Congress/St. Louis
ShortDescription: WB 7 Harrison buses are temp rerouted via Congress Parkway, Homan, Jackson, Central Park, Congress Parkway due to street blockage near Congress/St. Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress Parkway, Homan, Jackson, Central Park, Congress Parkway due to, street blockage near Congress/St. Louis.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
